original_text: This shows that you have not obeyed what God says is right. Instead, you have obeyed the ideas that you received from your leaders many years ago. And you do many other things like that.’
korean_text: 너희가 전한 전통으로 하나님의 말씀을 폐하며 또 이같은 일을 많이 행하느니라 하시고

sentences.original_text: This shows that you have not obeyed
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 당신이 순종하지 않았다는 것을 보여줍니다

sentences.original_text: from your leaders many years ago
And you do many other things like that
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신은 그런 것들과 비슷한 다른 많은 일들을 합니다
